text: Harold Vernon Froehlich (born May 12, 1932) is an American politician. He was born in Appleton, Wisconsin. He is a U.S. Representative from Wisconsin's 8th congressional district. He is a Republican. Froehlich was appointed a circuit court judge in Outagamie County, Wisconsin, in 1981, and served until he retired from the bench on April 8, 2011.'Outagamie County Judge Harold Froehlich set to retire,' Appleton Post Crescent, March 15, 2011 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Wisconsin Category:American judges Category:People from Appleton, Wisconsin Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Harold V. Froehlich
